features: Fabric softener ball: The rolling of the TPR laundry balls drive the water flow to blend more fully with the fabric softener, allowing clothes to be washed more fully, softer and static-free.

Powder Laundry detergent masher: Skeletonized design, fully stirring the laundry detergent powder in the water flow, the laundry powder evenly dissolved, while the laundry ball can help the water flow to scrub the clothes effectively, so that the clothes are cleaned more thoroughly. TPR soft ball design, while cleaning the clothes, will not cause damage to the clothes.
Eco-Design Laundry Balls: Reusable non-chemical laundry detergent ball. Can be used over and over again without creating any fine flakes, lint, etc. on your clothes.
Clothing knots remover: Soften fabric without noise and more space between clothes to tangling laundry and keep clothes in shape. Safe for bras, hats, and delicates.

Detergent Balls for washing machines: Washer agitator balls are good helpers for washing machine, the use of agitator balls in washing machines is a continuation of centuries of laundry tradition and a fusion of modern laundry technology. It allows clothes to be cleaned thoroughly and effectively every time.
body.description: Why use washing balls?Color fading occurs when clothes are worn for a long time, in fact, it is the fact that every time the clothes are not cleaned thoroughly, it accumulates for a long time and leads to color fading. Especially the lively and cute children, their clothes are always various accidents, please believe me, don't be angry with your children or blame them, it's their nature.That's why it's very important to clean your clothes every time, using laundry ball, you can make sure that your clothes are cleaned deeply every time you wash them, say goodbye to fading clothes and make laundry easier.
